last_episode_to_air.name: Funny, We Shrunk the Adults
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alvin and the boys get a little carried away when they mistakenly use Simon's shrinking machine on Dave and Mrs. Miller. However this makes for a wide-open musical skateboarding rally, which is their current fad.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
overview: Three chipmunk brothers, Alvin, Simon, and Theodore are adopted by human, Dave.

seasons.name: The Chipmunks Go to the Movies

episodes.name: The C-Team
episodes.overview: After Alvin, Simon and Theodore use Dave's antique gold pocket watch for Show & Tell at school, neighborhood bullies steal it. The Chipmunks find Mr.T to ask him for some advice and with his help they manage to get the watch back.

episodes.name: The Chipettes
episodes.overview: For the first time The Chipmunks meet their female counterparts, The Chipettes: Brittany, Jeanette and Eleanor.

episodes.name: Uncle Harry
episodes.overview: A charaltan chipmunk named Harry claims to be Alvin, Simon and Theodore's long lost uncle and says he will have them see their mother as soon as they make enough money. The Chipmunks later not only find out that Harry is not their uncle but also the money he has them making is for a carnival strongman who he has owed for a long time.

episodes.name: Rock 'n' Robot
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks create a robot out of Alvin's video game, so that it can carry all of their equipment to their concerts. But, the robot goes beserk when it begins to capture every hat it sees, like the video game, it was created from, and It's up to Alvin, Simon, and Theodore to stop the robot.

episodes.name: The Television Stars
episodes.overview: Alvin tells a girl he wants to impress that they are famous and that they are going to be starring in a rock concert on live t.v., but Alvin must convince the producer to let him play.

episodes.name: The Cruise
episodes.overview: Alvin unknowingly assists a jewel thief steal some jewelry from a cabin on their cruise ship, and Simon and Theodore begin to investigate the crime.

episodes.name: The Chipmunks Story
episodes.overview: The origin of the Chipmunks is revealed, including how Dave ended up with the Chipmunks in the first place, as well as how their musical career got started.

episodes.name: Mr. Fabulous
episodes.overview: Alvin and Simon have Theodore enter a wrestling exhibition under the name ""Mr.Fabulous"" and he goes up against a montrous Russian wrestler called Ivan The Terrible.

episodes.name: Grandpa and Grandma Seville
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks meet their grandparents for the first time. Then, when they discover that someone is trying to take over their Grandparents farm, they decide to raise the money needed to save the farm.

episodes.name: Unidentified Flying Chipmunk
episodes.overview: Alvin convinces Theodore to dress up as an alien to attract more fans, but they also attract some investigators with the government who research ufo's. The investigators decide to kidnap Theodore and perform experiments on him and Alvin and Simon must think of a way to save him.

episodes.name: Mother's Day
episodes.overview: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore go in search for a mother to attend their school picnic. Each choose the person, that they each think Dave will like best. But, when all three of their choices arrive at their house, Alvin, Simon, and Theodore, will do anything to make sure that their choice wins.

episodes.name: The Chip-Punks
episodes.overview: Alvin decided to change the Chipmunks image to gain more publicity, but end up running from the police, when they attend a rave.

episodes.name: From Here to Fraternity
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks make up a singing telegraph service to help buy some golf clubs for Dave's Birthday. But when Theodore loses the addresses, the boys are sent on a birthday mission, for a 100 dollar bonus. Except, that when Theodore wrote the number he wrote it upside down, so the Chipmunks end up going to the wrong house and are tricked into doing some different pranks for some highschoolers who are bored.

episodes.name: Urban Chipmunk
episodes.overview: The boys enter a contest so that they can win a chance to sing with Dolly Parton. But, the only way they can win is if they are from Nashville. The boys enter the contest anyway, but make an enemy when they win. The person who got second place in the drawing is determined to prove that the Chipmunks aren't from Nashville, and win his chance to sing with Dolly Parton.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Dave
episodes.overview: Dave has a nightmare of himself getting smaller and smaller.

episodes.name: Angelic Alvin
episodes.overview: Alvin loses his memory and thinks that he is an angel.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Nanny
episodes.overview: Dave hires a nanny to take care of the Chipmunks when he is away at work, and the Chipmunks will do anything to get rid of her.

episodes.name: The Bully Ballet
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks invite a boy to stay with them who is a ballet dancer, and when a bulley begins to torment Alvin, he shows the bulley that ballet is cool.

episodes.name: Alvin... and the Chipmunk
episodes.overview: Alvin demands a short trip away from obsessed fans who begin following him everywhere he goes. So, the Chipmunks go for a picnic out in the woods, only to be found again by their fans. Alvin runs off into the woods, and runs into a wild chipmunk. He decides to change places with the chipmunk, and he stays in the chipmunk's tree, while the wild chipmunk takes his place. All goes well until the real Alvin is caught by a hunter that holds him hostage. Simon, Theodore, and the wild chipmunk must save Alvin before it's to late.

episodes.name: Swiss Family Chipmunks
episodes.overview: Dave drags the Chipmunks unwillingly on a camping trip in the great out doors. When they finally arrive, the Chipmunks discover large footprints and think they are being followed by Bigfoot. Eventually they build a treehouse for Dave, when he falls and injures himself badly, and Alvin and Simon go in search for Big Foot.

episodes.name: Santa Harry
episodes.overview: Charlatan chipmunk Harry returns and this time pretends to be Santa Claus and cons Alvin, Simon and Theodore into building a Christmas-themed amusement park called ""Santa's Place"".

episodes.name: A Dog's Best Friend is His Chipmunk
episodes.overview: Alvin donates money to an animalfund raiser, and discovers that they don't have any money. In, an attempt toearn some money, they decide to sell the cookies that Theodore spent their, money on. But, when the Chipmunks find a dog, they must hide it from Dave.

episodes.name: The Curse of Lontiki
episodes.overview: When the Chipmunks go to Hawaii, Alvin enters a surfing contest, and becomes convinced that he is cursed when he finds a medallian on the beach that is suppose to bring bad luck.

episodes.name: Baseball Heroes
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks get a job as vendors at a baseball stadium, to pay for new uniforms for their baseball team. And in the process stop a pick pocket who has been stealing money.

episodes.name: May the Best Chipmunk Win
episodes.overview: The chipettes move to the Chipmunks school and Alvin and Brittany run against each other for class president. Both will stop at nothing to win, but when the polls are revealed they discover that Jeanette has the deciding vote.

episodes.name: The Chipmunk Who Bugged Me
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks experience a real-life mystery on the famed Orient Express.

episodes.name: Rich and Infamous
episodes.overview: Alvin and a rich kid compete for a girl's affections. Alvin pretends he is rich as his rival.

episodes.name: A Horse, of Course
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks invest in an old horse to win a race.

episodes.name: Don't Be a Vidiot
episodes.overview: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore each make their own music videos for the group.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Alvin
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry is up to no good again. This time, he makes Alvin a movie star so he can break up the Chipmunks.

episodes.name: The Camp Calomine Caper
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks compete against the Chipettes in a camp battle of the sexes.

episodes.name: Some Entrancing Evening
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks put Dave on the show ""This is Your Father"", but he is nervous about it. So a hypnotist makes him have Alvin's personality, which turns to be a disasterous move.

episodes.name: Match Play
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks trick Dave to play golf with a man that Alvin made a wager with. What Dave does not realize is that Alvin bet his signed "Elmer Palmer" golf club.

episodes.name: The Picture of Health
episodes.overview: Alvin decides that the they all need to join a gym.

episodes.name: The Victrola Awards
episodes.overview: Alvin and the Chipmunks attempt to grab good publicity shots of them doing positive deeds in order to win the fabulous Victrola Award.

episodes.name: Royally Received
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks gets to see the (Buckingham?) Palace, and Alvin, in an attempt to impress a girl whose a big fan, tells her he's there to play for the queen! Now, all he has to do is find the queen and convince her to let them play!

episodes.name: Gone Fishing
episodes.overview: Alvin and the Chipmunks get a job working in aquarium, but Max, a former employee, who got fired for animal abuse, cooks up a scheme to force the Chipmunks out of a job and work again, by capturing one of 2 whales.

episodes.name: Setting the Record Straight
episodes.overview: Alvin and Simon turn Theodore into a record mascot in order to win a radio contest.

episodes.name: Father's Day Muffins
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks attempt to sell Theodore's famous muffins so they may buy Dave a new tape recorder for Father's Day, but Simon's hardening agent accidentally ending up in the batter causes the muffins to harden.

episodes.name: Alvin on Ice
episodes.overview: Alvin plans to get a famous figure skater, Heather Williams, to appear at the school Pageant.

episodes.name: Operation Theodore
episodes.overview: While the Chipettes volunteer at the local hospital, a terrified tonsillectomy-bound kid goes missing, so until Brittany finds him, Theodore must step in to substitute, but the doctors, thinking he's the kid, take him into surgery.

episodes.name: The Gang's All Here
episodes.overview: Alvin ends up being challenged by a gang called the Steam Rollers. Will he, his brothers, and the Chipettes pull together a gang of their own to help beat the Steam Rollers?

episodes.name: Snow Job
episodes.overview: Alvin is determined in getting an invitation to participate the Celebrity Ski Tournament. Once he convinces Mr. Colorado, the man hosting the event, to let him participate, all Alvin has to do then is learn how to ski.

episodes.name: My Fair Chipette
episodes.overview: Alvin makes a bet with Brittany to see if he could make anyone into a beauty pageant winner. The challenge gets interesting when Jeanette is the girl he has to transform into beauty pageant material.

episodes.name: Maids In Japan
episodes.overview: Alvin signs him and his brothers up to be in a Kabuki theater in order to gain publicity in Japan.

episodes.name: The Greatest Show-offs on Earth
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks and the Chipettes volunteer their talents to raise the money to keep the circus going.

episodes.name: New, Improved Simon
episodes.overview: Simon has a crush on a girl named Jillian. Alvin works at changing his image in order to impress this girl.

episodes.name: Guardian Chipmunks
episodes.overview: Dave starts up a neighborhood watch to catch a cat burglar. Alvin and the Chipmunks take it upon themselves to capture the cat burglar single handedly.

episodes.name: Carsick
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks get the measles. Dave spends so much time taking care of his boys that he becomes sick with the measles and is not able to fix his car for the car show. It is up to the boys take care of everything for Dave.

episodes.name: Snow Wrong
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks and Chipettes audition to be in a play on Snow White. After the audition, the director selects Brittany for the role of Snow White. However, the director's demanding daughter, Tara-Marie, who had flopped big-time in the auditions for the title role, plans to make her father reconsider.

episodes.name: Hat Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Alvin's favorite hat goes missing.

episodes.name: A Chipmunk Reunion
episodes.overview: When they can't determine when their birthday is, the Chimpunks set out to find their mother, who abandoned them as babies.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of David Seville
A Chip off the Old Tooth
A Little Worm in the Big Apple
The Chipette Story, Part 1
episodes.overview: The Chippette's are reunited with their old Austrailian friend Olivia, which prompt's the singer's to remember their younger days when they were just little tiny chippete's not trying to have a career, only trying to survive.

episodes.name: The Chipette Story, Part 2
episodes.overview: The Chipette's successfully make their way into the U.S.A., yet they find out the hard way that getting there is only half the battle. After taking various odd jobs in middle management, the Chipette's travel across the continent to California. There the girls manage to find a famous record producer who after hearing their first song, gives the Chipette's the break they were looking for. The rest of course, is history.

episodes.name: Alvin's Oldest Fan
episodes.overview: There is a contest where one of Alvin's fans can win a date with him. Unfortunately for Alvin, the winner is an old lady, and he tries to get rid of her.

episodes.name: A Rash of Babies
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks start a babysitting service, only to be bombarded with wall to wall babies

episodes.name: Miss Miller's Big Gamble
episodes.overview:
The Chipettes decide to help out Miss Miller's losing streak of poker with her girlfriends by cheating.  At the next poker game, Miss Miller's not aware that the girls are helping her secretly.  She starts winning buttons from the other players & they leave upset.

Miss Miller heads to her mattress to get her mad money out, head over to Las Vegas with the Chipettes in tow!  Luckilly, the Chipmunks are performing at that same hotel & the girls try to get the boys help of stopping Miss Miller.

Meanwhile, she's on a winning streak hitting jackpots @ slots, roulette.  She promises the girls a super vacation.  But then, she starts losing @ blackjack.  A hotel staff invites her to play baccarat with a mysterious player.  She bets the house & loses.

When they came back home, Miss Miller finds out the truth that the girls didn't mean any harm over finally winning her poker game.  Then a cab comes by & the driver hands an envelope to Miss Miller.  It was the deed to her house.  It turned out tha

episodes.name: Cinderella? Cinderella? Part 1
episodes.overview: When Brittany refuses to do her chores, Miss Miller tells her that she must mop if she wishes to go to a dance that night. Brittany falls asleep and dreams she is Cinderella. She awakens to find a new party dress and Miss Miller mopping for her. Brittany realizes she is not living with the wicked stepmother after all.

episodes.name: Cinderella? Cinderella? Part 2
episodes.overview: When Brittany refuses to do her chores, Miss Miller tells her that she must mop if she wishes to go to a dance that night. Brittany falls asleep and dreams she is Cinderella. She awakens to find a new party dress and Miss Miller mopping for her. Brittany realizes she is not living with the wicked stepmother after all.

episodes.name: How You Gonna' Keep 'Em Down on the Farm?
Back To Dave's Future
episodes.overview: A wild ride on a merry-go-round sends the Chipmunks back to 1962. They meet a younger Dave. Without the boys' help in winning a band contest, he will spend his life as an accountant. When they are spun into the present, Alvin isn't sure whether he visited the past or bumped his head in a fall off the merry-go-round.

episodes.name: Tell It To the Judge
episodes.overview: Alvin "borrows" Dave's new bike, and while he is out riding he accidentally hits Brittany who is out roller skating. The bike is ruined, and something is wrong with her skates. They each blame each other, and Alvin demands Brittany pay for Dave's bike, while she insists he pay for her roller skates. All of this brings us to court, where Brittany and Alvin, ignoring the "TRUTH" part in justice, face off in a "who can tell a better lie about what happened" court battle.

episodes.name: Sincerely Theodore
episodes.overview: Theodore goes on a diet so he could go on a date with a pen pal, who is also one of Alvin's biggest fans. Things go wrong when Alvin finds out that Theodore's date is actually the daughter of a famous film director. Alvin then takes her out instead, breaking Theodore's heart. In order for Alvin to make it to his play and the date, Alvin gets Theodore to switch back and forth to his play and on his date.

episodes.name: My Pharaoh Lady
episodes.overview: Brittany makes a bet with Missy Snootson, another girl in her class, that if the mummy of king Rooten Tooten does not rise from the dead and go to her home by midnight, Brittany must drop out of the race to be the school Carnival Queen.

episodes.name: Simon Says
episodes.overview: While Dave is out of town, Miss Miller babysits the boys and they go to a movie about killer space squids attacking the earth. Accidentally miss Miller breaks Simon's glasses. When they get out a telescope that evening, Simon thinks he sees killer squids coming toward earth, just like in the movie.

episodes.name: When the Chips Are Down
episodes.overview: The boys have to paint the garage after they got spray paint on the walls while repainting their bicycles. Simon and Theodore feels bad because they always have problems with Alvin's ideas. Later Alvin have them to go to a mansion of a now dead criminal. Alvin is convinced that a never found loot from a bankrobbery is still hidden there. They go because Alvin promises to paint all the garage if he's wrong, but they feel a little bad with Alvin.

episodes.name: Alvin, Alvin, Alvin!
episodes.overview: Alvin goes through an identity crisis and starts trying all kinds of different personalities, with embarrassing results.

episodes.name: Dave's Dream Cabin
episodes.overview: After years of scrimping and saving, Dave is finally able to afford their own vacation cabin. Alvin hears that Robby Leach, the host of the show “Lifestyles of the Truly Fabulous” lives nearby. Alvin tries to get Leach to interview him, and at the same time he makes a few quick changes to Dave's cabin.

episodes.name: Old Friends
episodes.overview: Alvin nearly runs over an elderly woman in the mall with his skateboard. When Alvin finds out that she is wealthy, he sends out invitations for a senior citizens' party in order to find her.

episodes.name: The Secret of Seville Manor
episodes.overview: While in England, the Chipmunks check out Seville Manor to investigate if they have any relation to the man who owned it.

episodes.name: Ask Alvin
episodes.overview: The family becomes fed up with Alvin, who always gives out advice whether it is wanted or not. So Simon and Theodore get Alvin to become the new host on the talk show “Mr. Advice” so he will not have time to badger them.

episodes.name: Theodore Lucks Out
episodes.overview: Theodore is feeling unlucky in the track and field. He finds a bent out of shape dime and his luck changes.

episodes.name: Big Dreams
episodes.overview:
Alvin gets a registered letter from the Publishing Warehouse stating he's a winner!  He either could take $500 or the mystery prize, but had to call by 6:00 pm to decide.

So with Simon's time machine help, the Chipmunks & Chipettes view what would happen if Alvin took...

$500 - Alvin & Brittany are married with two kids & they live in a mansion.  Simon & Jeanette are married as they both got Nobel Prizes while Theodore & Eleanor are married, owning a restaurant/nightclub.  They are rich!

Mystery Prize - Alvin loses his singing voice after being food poisoned over that mystery prize.  All three couples live in poverty.

So Alvin calls the Publishing Warehouse to take the $500.  Then he's heartbroken to learn that you have to be @ least 18 to qualify for the Publishing Warehouse Sweepstakes!

episodes.name: Island Fever
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks and Chipettes get to perform on a high class cruise ship, the Island Lady, but instead they end up ship wrecked on an island.

episodes.name: Just One of the Girls
episodes.overview:
Miss Miller & the Chipettes are vacationing in Hollywood, as well as Miss Miller reuniting with her girl singing group, The Thrillers.

In the lobby of the hotel, they learn that some producers are looking for new acts on their new show, ""Girls of Rock & Roll"".

Sneaking behind each others backs, the Chipettes along with Miss Miller & The Thrillers try to get an audition set @ the hotel restaurant.  The producers chose both of them (without the other knowing).

When each group arrives @ the studio, they perform ""Boogie Woogie Bugle Boy"".  But just as they confessed to each other that they were auditioning, the producers find a punk girl band touring the studio & hired them over both acts!

episodes.name: Goin' Down To Dixie
episodes.overview: The Chipettes get an opportunity to star on the River Ritz Hotel in New Orleans, Louisiana.

episodes.name: Dreamlighting
episodes.overview: While waiting for procrastinating Alvin on one of their dates, Brittany has a dream and becomes "Bratty Hayes" and Alvin becomes "David Alvinson", detective team. The plot revolves around Alvin trying to stop Brittany from marrying an evil villain - played by Simon.

episodes.name: Elementary, My Dear Simon
episodes.overview: Simon hosts his own show, playing Sherlock Holmes investigating several mysterious robberies.

episodes.name: Brunch Club
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks and Chipettes are in detention. They figure out together who could have knocked over the statue of Thomas Edison.

episodes.name: Food for Thought
episodes.overview: Alvin and Simon work together to help Theodore pass his American History test.

episodes.name: Wings Over Siesta Grande
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks go on a treasure hunt and meet the ancient Chipmunk tribe called the Twee-Twee Tribe.

episodes.name: Treasure Island
episodes.overview: After playing a video game, the TV blows up. Dave decides to distract the Chipmunks with the book Treasure Island.

episodes.name: Chipmunkmania
episodes.overview: This episode takes a look back at the history of the Chipmunks' career.

episodes.name: Grounded Chipmunk
episodes.overview: Alvin is forced to clean up the house after throwing a wild party while Dave is away and is not allowed to go with his brothers to Fantasy Park. During which, he combats his fear of loneliness, and experiences bizarre incidents including an alien.

episodes.name: Alvie's Angels
episodes.overview: The Chipettes are Alvie's Angels, a crime fighting team to hunt down the most popular jewel thief named Chazz Fleming.

episodes.name: Cadet's Regrets
episodes.overview: Alvin enrolls himself and his brothers in cadet camp.

episodes.name: Alvin in Analysis
episodes.overview: Alvin sees a psychologist to go over his issues with his family.

episodes.name: Dave's Getting Married
episodes.overview: Dave meets a woman he really feels a strong connection with. At first the boys disagree, but finds she can get along with all of them. The only thing preventing this relationship to work is her own three boys clashing with the Chipmunks.

episodes.name: No Chipmunk is an Island
episodes.overview: Brothers will fight every so often, but will they fight too much leading to each of the Chipmunks get their own separate rooms?

episodes.name: Babysitter Fright Night
episodes.overview: Dave is stuck at the studio all night to mix the boy's next album. But he leaves a Babysitter to after the Chipmunks while he's gone. After watching a detective movie, Alvin suspects her to be a murderer.

episodes.name: Going for Broke
episodes.overview: Alvin is desperate to try and buy a Trans-Go-Go Bot, but Dave and his brothers will not lend him the money to get it. He decides to do the grown-up thing and get a job at the zoo.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Crime
episodes.overview: Alvin, Simon and Theodore find a huge attraction to one of Miss Miller's toys. Instead of asking her if they could keep it, they steal it from her attic. Dave tells them the beginning of a story, but chooses to let the boys come up with the conclusion.

episodes.name: The Phantom
episodes.overview: As an experiment Dave tries his skill as a rock singer and becomes a success.

episodes.name: Mad About Alvin
episodes.overview: Alvin has a misunderstanding with a tough kid in his class, and ends up being challenged to a fight with him.

episodes.name: Vinny's Visit
episodes.overview: Vinny, the Chipmunks' mother, comes for a visit, but has difficulties adapting to the modern way of life.

episodes.name: Uncle Adventure
episodes.overview: Uncle "Adventure" Willy

episodes.name: Luck O' the Chipmunks
episodes.overview: Micky, a new Irish boy at school, claims that he has his very own leprechaun. The Chipmunks are keen to investigate.

episodes.name: Theodore and Juliet
episodes.overview: Theodore develops a crush on a girl in his class named Juliet. Wanting some expert advice, Theodore asks Alvin for his help. Unwillingly, Alvin says a romantic line that Juliet overhears and she ends up developing a crush on Alvin instead of Theodore.

episodes.name: Quarterback in Curlers
episodes.overview: Brittany tries out for Alvin's football team. To get even, Alvin joins her cheerleading squad. Will they set aside their differences and help each other succeed?

episodes.name: The Wall
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks go to Berlin to play in the "Wall of Iron" concert by the Berlin Wall. There they meet and befriend a young girl named Caterina whom has a brother named Eric that lives on the other side.

episodes.name: The Amazing Chipmunks
episodes.overview: A crook uses the Chipmunks tour as camouflage for his own evil deeds: While people is out watching the Chipmunks concerts, his trained chimpanzees raid the empty houses.

episodes.name: Theodore's Life as a Dog
episodes.overview: Alvin plays one prank on Theodore and gets him to eat a dog biscuit. To get even, Theodore, with Simon's help, plays a trick on Alvin and makes him think that his younger brother is actually turning into a were-dog.

episodes.name: Queen of the High School Ballroom
episodes.overview: Miss Miller is invited to go to her High School reunion. But without her boyfriend to go with, the Chipettes try to get one of the Chipmunks to dress up to be Miss Miller's date.

episodes.name: Psychic Alvin
episodes.overview: By a fluke, Alvin actually passes his math test whereas, Simon mysteriously fails. Afterwards, Alvin believes he is psychic, and so does everyone else, except Simon.

episodes.name: Special Kind of Champion
episodes.overview: Alvin is upset that he can’t seem to keep up with the rest of his track race team. Being that so, his coach decides to let him become a trainer for one of the athletes of the Special Olympics.

episodes.name: Alvin's Obsession
episodes.overview: Alvin is upset that there is a new boy that just happens to be better at everything. To prove that Alvin has what it takes to beat this kid, he challenges him to anything he can think of.

episodes.name: Alvin's Not So Super Hero
episodes.overview: Alvin gets an opportunity to meet his hero from his favorite TV show.

episodes.name: Dave's Wonderful Life
episodes.overview: Dave is feeling depressed and is thinking that the Chipmunks would do better if he had never been apart of his life. Will the spirits of the Chipmunks convince him that he is indeed been an impact on Alvin, Simon, and Theodore’s lives?

episodes.name: Cookie Chomper III
episodes.overview: Theodore encounters a stray kitten that entered through an open window in the house. He and the boys take an instant liking to the kitten, and after some compromising, they name the kitten Cookie Chomper III, and after Dave is cured of his allergy to cats, he comes to like the kitten as well. After Cookie Chomper gets run over, the boys have a hard time dealing with it. Eventually, they get a new pet, a puppy they name Lilly.

episodes.name: Home, Sweet Home
episodes.overview: Alvin lies to his classmates that he will be singing on stage with Michael Jackson. As Alvin tries to find Michael in order to see if it really is possible he could perform with him, he meets up with the big star's manager. To Alvin's surprise, this so-called manager is a homeless man looking to find a place to stay.

episodes.name: All Worked Up
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks overhear Dave suggesting that he would prefer Alvin to be a Gymnastic Pizza Twirler, Simon a Pogo Stick Tester, and Theodore an iguana trainer, and immediately start to pursue those careers.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Seville Street
episodes.overview: The boys disobey Dave and instead of seeing a kid's movie, they go in and see a horror movie. The movie ends up scaring the Chipmunks out of their wits. All night, the boys think that Hideous Harold, the creature from the horror film, is after them.

episodes.name: Thinking Cap Trap
episodes.overview: Simon is frustrated being the smartest member of the family. He invents a cap that helps Dave and his brothers become smarter. Simon is so confident with his family’s new smarts that he signs them up to be on a genius game show. But before he could give his family another boost of the thinking cap, he loses it.

episodes.name: Bye George
episodes.overview: Alvin is desperate to write an essay on George Washington, that he uses Simon's time machine to bring George into the future.

episodes.name: A Day in the Life
episodes.overview: Simon makes a video of his family for his class project. Unfortunately for Dave and his brothers he took the video in not their greatest moments, and is nervous when Simon’s video will air on TV.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: Alvin is tired of being treated like a kid and trades place with Dave for a day to feel what it is like to be a grown-up.

episodes.name: Dr. Simon and Mr. Heartthrob
episodes.overview: Alvin tampers with Simon's hair growth formula and instead having it grow Simon's hair, it turns him into a heartthrob.

episodes.name: Too Hip to Be Dave
episodes.overview: Dave gets a bump on the head and forgets who he is. After seeing a commercial, Dave becomes a trendy stylish man.

episodes.name: Hearts and Flowers
episodes.overview: The Chipettes are excited for the summer holidays, but not when Miss Miller keeps making other plans for them. The girls decide to hook her up with an elderly man by the name of Mr. Flowers.

episodes.name: Malese Chipmunk
episodes.overview: Alvin has a dream that he is a detective from the 40s. He is on a case to find a famous rich girl named Brittany.

episodes.name: Dear Diary
episodes.overview: The Chipettes discover the joys of writing in a diary. Tension builds between them when they deliberately sneak a peak at what the other Chipette has written.

episodes.name: Unfair Science
episodes.overview: All three boys find themselves having a crush on the science substitute teacher. In order to impress her, they each make a project for the science fair.

episodes.name: Shaking the Family Tree
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks decide to have a family reunion with their aunts and uncle, but things are not well between them. Each Chipmunk finds out that the three of them have issues and believes many years ago each of them tried to sabotage the other in their chosen carriers.

episodes.name: Inner Dave
episodes.overview: The boys are accidentally shrunk by one of Simon's inventions. They end up going inside Dave's head in order to try telling him what happened.

episodes.name: The Legend of Sleeping Brittany
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks and Chipettes participate in the school journalism. They end up covering the story of "Sleeping Beauty". During the investigation, Brittany pricks her finger on the spin wheel and becomes cursed, just like the real story.

episodes.name: Three Chipmunks and a Puppy
episodes.overview: The boys are fed up with their puppy's antics and set out to train Lilly to behave. But soon the Chipmunks feel they are not qualified to raise her and they give her away.

episodes.name: Phantom of the Rock Opera
episodes.overview: The janitor gets a chance to sing on stage.

episodes.name: The Return of Uncle Adventure
episodes.overview: Cruise leads to the Fountain of Youth.

episodes.name: The Princess and the Pig
episodes.overview: Brittany works at a farm.

episodes.name: Alvin in Neverland
episodes.overview: A girl rejects Alvin because he's too childish. Therefore, Alvin decides to go prematurely adult, and only do grown-up things - and he forces his brothers to do the same! But by reading him the story of Peter Pan, Dave makes Alvin understand what a wonderful adventure childhood can be.

episodes.name: Merry Christmas, Mr. Carroll
episodes.overview: Alvin, as usual, is thinking of himself when it comes around to being Christmas. He is so focused on receiving presents that he fails to think of poor Mr. Carroll, who just wants his morning paper. Will the spirits of Christmas past, present, and future help Alvin learn the error of his ways?

episodes.name: Back to Our Future
episodes.overview: A play-off of Back To The Future. The Chipmunks travel back in time where Alvin doesn't know if he wants to be a musician anymore. Simon and Theodre have some convincing to do.

episodes.name: Bigger
episodes.overview: Alvin wishes he is bigger so he wouldn’t be treated as a child all the time. His wish does come true over night and now he has to learn to live life as an adult.

episodes.name: Kong!
episodes.overview: Alvin creates a lot of attention for the legendary King Kong so that he could benifit by shooting a movie. Kiki, Alvins new friend, has a differnent idea of how Kong should be treated.

episodes.name: Batmunk
episodes.overview: Simon transforms into the legandary Batmunk. This is a play off of Batman. Batmunk must stop an evil plan that involves a large toy heist.

episodes.name: Daytona Jones and the Pearl of Wisdom
episodes.overview: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore are show as if they were in an Indiana Jones film. This episode is filled with adventure, humor, and courage.

episodes.name: Star Wreck: The Absolutely Final Frontier
episodes.overview: Responding to a distress call, the USS Booby Prize encounters a dangerous alien race that wishes everything in the entire galaxy exactly the same. Captain James T. Dirk (Alvin), Mr. Speck (Simon), Dr. Moamz McRoy (Theodore), Lt. Uhaha (Jeanette) and Ms. Supra (Eleanor).

episodes.name: Robomunk
episodes.overview: This episode placed Alvin, Simon, and Theodore right in the middle of the Robocop movie.

episodes.name: S.T. the Space Traveler
episodes.overview: The boys meet a real life alien, and they try to hide him from a pair of scientists who wish to capture the alien and do experiments on him.

episodes.name: Irrational Buffoon's European Vacation
episodes.overview: After winning first prize on "America's Most Embarrassing Home Videos", Clark Sevillewald (Dave Seville), and the boys get to go to Wacky World in Europe.

episodes.name: Chip Tracy
episodes.overview: In this adventure the chipmunks are placed in a mod ran city where they had to fight crime. This was a play off of Dick Tracy.

episodes.name: Gremlionis
episodes.overview: The Chipmunks go up against a bunch of ancient gremlins that originated from Italy.

episodes.name: Sploosh
episodes.overview: Jeanette is a beautiful mermaid who meets a shy scientist's assistant named Simon.

episodes.name: Funny, We Shrunk the Adults
episodes.overview: Alvin and the boys get a little carried away when they mistakenly use Simon's shrinking machine on Dave and Mrs. Miller. However this makes for a wide-open musical skateboarding rally, which is their current fad.

8.name: The Chipmunks Go to the Movies
